name: Brandon Zhang
description: I am a frontend developer with a passion for creating beautiful and user-friendly websites and applications. I have a strong background in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and I am experienced in using popular frontend frameworks such as React and Angular. I enjoy working closely with designers to bring their vision to life and ensure that the user interface is visually appealing and intuitive. In addition to my technical skills, I have a good understanding of responsive design principles, allowing me to create websites and applications that look great on all devices and screen sizes.
